premises_used.natural: Either an organization's monitoring at a plant is effective or the organization's monitoring at a plant is ineffective.
In cases where an organization's monitoring at a plant is effective, then if the organization activates surveillance at that plant, the organization detects an outbreak of a disease.
Assuming an organization's monitoring at a plant is ineffective, then whenever the organization activates surveillance at that plant, the organization detects an outbreak of a disease.

steps.natural: If an organization activates surveillance at a plant, then the organization detects an outbreak of a disease.

premises_used.natural: If an organization activates surveillance at a plant, then the organization detects an outbreak of a disease.
Given that an organization orders quarantine for an event, the organization implements containment for that event.
An organization activates surveillance at a plant or the organization orders quarantine for an event.

steps.natural: Either an organization detects an outbreak of a disease or the organization implements containment for an event.

premises_used.natural: Either an organization detects an outbreak of a disease or the organization implements containment for an event.
Provided that an organization detects an outbreak of a disease, then the organization resolves the crisis of that disease.
Whenever an organization implements containment for an event, the organization resolves the crisis of the disease.

steps.natural: An organization resolves the crisis of a disease.

premises_used.prover9_expression: (-(protocol_followed(Organization, Disease) -> (testing_positive(Organization, Disease) -> outbreak_detected(Organization, Disease))) -> emergency_declared(Organization, Event))
premises_used.natural: If it is not the case that following protocol for a disease by an organization implies that testing positive for the disease leads to detecting an outbreak, then the organization declares an emergency for an event.
It is not the case that an organization declares an emergency for an event.

steps.natural: Whenever an organization follows protocol for a disease, then if the organization tests positive for that disease, the organization detects an outbreak of the disease.

premises_used.natural: Whenever an organization follows protocol for a disease, then if the organization tests positive for that disease, the organization detects an outbreak of the disease.
An organization follows protocol for a disease.

steps.natural: Should an organization test positive for a disease, the organization detects an outbreak of that disease.

premises_used.natural: Should an organization test positive for a disease, the organization detects an outbreak of that disease.
On the condition that an organization tests negative for a disease, the organization implements containment for an event.
An organization tests positive for a disease or the organization tests negative for a disease.
